title: Stage Lv6-P4-S27
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Even if we start now, by the time we finish, it might be too late.
I'll help you whenever you need, as long as I'm available.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 지금 시작하더라도, 끝날 때쯤이면 너무 늦을지도 모릅니다.
sentences.en: Even if we start now, by the time we finish, it might be too late.

sentences.kr: 제가 시간이 허락하는 한, 언제든지 도와드리겠습니다.
sentences.en: I'll help you whenever you need, as long as I'm available.
Although the market is volatile, we will proceed if conditions improve.

sentences.kr: 비록 예산이 부족하지만, 모든 팀원이 노력한다면 성공할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: Even though the budget is limited, if everyone on the team makes an effort, we can succeed.

sentences.kr: 경쟁이 치열하더라도, 우리가 혁신을 계속한다면 시장을 선도할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: Although competition is fierce, if we continue to innovate, we can lead the market.

sentences.kr: 위험 요소가 있지만, 적절한 계획을 세운다면 위험을 최소화할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: While there are risk factors, if we develop proper plans, we can minimize the risks.

sentences.kr: 시간이 촉박하더라도, 품질을 유지하는 한 고객들은 만족할 것입니다.
sentences.en: Even if time is tight, as long as we maintain quality, customers will be satisfied.

sentences.kr: 자원이 제한적이지만, 효율적으로 활용한다면 목표를 달성할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: Although resources are limited, if we use them efficiently, we can achieve our goals.
